+const client = createClient(ApplicationService, transport);
 
 export const applicationService = {

+    create: async (data: Partial<Application>) => {

+            loanPurpose: data.loanPurpose || "",
+            applicationChannel: data.applicationChannel || "",
+            branchCode: data.branchCode || "",
+            attributes: data.attributes?.map(a => ({
+                key: a.key,
+                value: a.value,
+                dataType: a.dataType
+            })) || []
+        });
+        return response;
+    },
 
     getById: (id: string) =>
-        apiClient.get<Application>(`/v1/applications/${id}`),

-    list: (params?: Record<string, string>) =>

+    list: async (params?: Record<string, string>) => {
+        const response = await client.listApplications({
+            cursor: params?.cursor || "",
+            status: params?.status || "",
+            applicantId: params?.applicantId || ""
+        });
 
-    delete: (id: string) =>
-        apiClient.delete<void>(`/v1/applications/${id}`),
+        return {
+            applications: response.applications.map(app => ({
+                id: app.id,
+                applicantId: app.applicantId,
+                productId: app.productId,
+                aoId: app.aoId,
+                loanAmount: app.loanAmount,
+                tenorMonths: app.tenorMonths,
+                interestType: app.interestType,
+                interestRate: app.interestRate,
+                loanPurpose: app.loanPurpose,
+                applicationChannel: app.applicationChannel,
+                status: app.status,
+                branchCode: app.branchCode,
+                attributes: app.attributes,
+                createdAt: app.createdAt ? new Date(Number(app.createdAt.seconds) * 1000).toISOString() : undefined,
+                updatedAt: app.updatedAt ? new Date(Number(app.updatedAt.seconds) * 1000).toISOString() : undefined,
+                submittedAt: app.submittedAt ? new Date(Number(app.submittedAt.seconds) * 1000).toISOString() : undefined,
+            })),
+            nextCursor: response.nextCursor,
+        };
+    },
 
-    updateStatus: (id: string, status: string) =>
-        apiClient.patch<Application>(`/v1/applications/${id}/status`, { status }),
+    updateStatus: async (id: string, status: string) => {
+        const response = await client.changeApplicationStatus({
+            id,
+            newStatus: status,
+            reason: ""
+        });
+        return response;
+    },
 };
